original_text: And the residue of the number of archers, the mighty men of the children of Kedar, shall be diminished: for the Lord God of Israel hath spoken it.
korean_text: 게달 자손 중 활 가진 용사의 남은 수가 적으리라 하시니라 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: And the residue of the number of archers
the mighty men of the children of Kedar
for the Lord God of Israel
